RelatedSentence: The Dutch government hands out billions of euros in subsidies every year but has little idea if the money is well spent , the NRC reported at the weekend .
The Dutch government hands out billions of euros in subsidies every year but has little idea if the money is well spent , the NRC reported at the weekend .

Subsidies handed out in 2010 went to cannabis cafes , the Casa Rosso sex club , an Islamic group said to have terrorist links and a caviar company where the owner has convictions for fraud , the NRC said .

Subsidies handed out in 2010 went to cannabis cafes , the Casa Rosso sex club , an Islamic group said to have terrorist links and a caviar company where the owner has convictions for fraud , the NRC said .
The information comes from research by Graydon into 5,360 companies and institutions which received government grants in 2010 .

A1: law does not allow requests for subsidies
RelatedSentence: A spokesman for the government service department RVO said the law does not allow requests for subsidies to be assessed on the basis of having a criminal record .
A spokesman for the government service department RVO said the law does not allow requests for subsidies to be assessed on the basis of having a criminal record .
Subsidies are handed out by different ministries and there is no accurate picture of how much is spent overall , the paper said .

The government operates over 630 different subsidy schemes .
The last time the government gave a detailed overview of its subsidy programme was in 2010 .
